Grabhitch only worth when its really on your way

anyone have any suggestions what kind of jobs i can do to earn with a car without pdvl?

If you have a car and want to earn money without a Private Hire Car Driver's Vocational Licence (PDVL)  here are some options you can consider:Delivery Services:Food Delivery: Join platforms like GrabFood  Foodpanda  or Deliveroo.Parcel Delivery: Companies like Lalamove  GOGOX  and Ninja Van often look for drivers to deliver packages.Courier Services:Partner with logistics companies to transport documents  small packages  or specialized items.Advertising on Your Car:Rent out space on your car for advertisements. Companies like Carvertise and Wrapify pay drivers to display ads on their vehicles.Ridesharing (Carpooling):Offer carpooling services through platforms like Ryde or GrabHitch  where you share your ride with others going in the same direction.Moving Services:Provide moving or hauling services for people relocating or needing to transport large items.Errand Services:Offer to run errands for busy individuals  such as grocery shopping  picking up prescriptions  or other tasks.Freelance Chauffeur:Offer personal chauffeur services for special events or business trips without requiring a PDVL  as long as itâ€™s occasional and not regular private hire services.Tour Services:Provide local tour services  showcasing tourist spots and attractions in your area.School Transport:Offer school transportation services for children if it aligns with local regulations.Pet Transportation:Provide transport services for pets to and from grooming appointments  vet visits  or pet daycare.These options allow you to utilize your car to generate income without needing a PDVL. Be sure to check local regulations and requirements to ensure compliance with any legal and safety standards.

Good morning! For a short-term MPV that's in good condition and suitable for trips to Johor Bahru (JB)  you might consider models known for reliability and comfort. Here are a few options:Toyota Wish: Known for its reliability  spacious interior  and comfortable ride  the Toyota Wish is a popular choice for short trips across the border.Honda Odyssey: The Honda Odyssey offers a comfortable and spacious interior  making it ideal for family trips. It also has a reputation for being reliable.Kia Carens: The Kia Carens is a compact MPV that offers good value for money  with a comfortable ride and ample space for passengers and luggage.Mazda 5: The Mazda 5 is a stylish and practical MPV with a versatile interior. It's known for its smooth handling and comfortable ride.Nissan Serena: The Nissan Serena is a spacious and practical MPV with sliding doors  making it easy to access the rear seats. It's also known for its reliability.Before making a decision  it's advisable to test drive the vehicle to ensure it meets your needs for comfort  space  and suitability for trips to JB. Additionally  consider factors such as fuel efficiency and maintenance costs to make an informed choice.

Kia Carens and Mazda 5 Suitability: Both the Kia Carens and Mazda 5 are designed to accommodate 6 or 7 passengers. While they might be smaller compared to larger MPVs  they are still practical for short-term use and urban driving. They offer reasonable comfort and versatility  which makes them suitable for ferrying passengers.Toyota Wish Affordability: The Toyota Wish is indeed an affordable option. It is well-regarded for its reliability  fuel efficiency  and practicality. It can serve as a cost-effective choice for those looking to transport multiple passengers.Nissan Serena: The Serena is known for its spacious interior and comfort. It is a mid-range option in terms of pricing and offers ample room for 7 passengers. Its features and reliability make it a solid choice for family or business use.Honda Odyssey Cost: While the Honda Odyssey is a premium MPV with excellent features and comfort  it comes at a higher price point. For short-term use (1 or 2 years)  investing in a more expensive vehicle may not be the most cost-effective decision  especially if budget constraints are a consideration.Mileage Concerns: The likelihood of a vehicle being a former PHV (private hire vehicle) with tempered mileage can vary across models. While higher-end models like the Odyssey might be less commonly used as PHVs  proper due diligence such as checking service records and vehicle history should be done for any used car  regardless of the model.In summary  while the Honda Odyssey offers superior features  for short-term use  the Kia Carens  Mazda 5  Toyota Wish  and Nissan Serena remain viable and more budget-friendly options. The decision should balance cost  reliability  and specific needs for passenger transport.

Oh  I totally get it. Why trust a language model that uses data  logic  and context to provide informed answers when you can just go with gut feelings and half-baked assumptions? Clearly  all those facts and well-reasoned arguments are just smoke and mirrors. And hey  it's not like cross-referencing multiple sources and critically evaluating information is something anyone should bother with  right? Much better to just dismiss anything that doesn't fit your preconceptions as "bs."
sometimes the info it has it outdated

Absolutely  because expecting a language model with a knowledge cutoff date to always have the latest information is completely reasonable. Itâ€™s not like humans ever rely on outdated information or anything. And letâ€™s just ignore the part where it provides contextually accurate and useful insights most of the time. But sure  letâ€™s focus on those rare instances where the info might not be up-to-the-minute. That's definitely the best way to assess its overall reliability.

Absolutely  because having access to a vast repository of knowledge  reasoning abilities  and providing well-informed answers 99% of the time is totally overshadowed by not having the latest scoop on yesterday's news. Clearly  that makes the model completely useless. Who needs reliable  well-reasoned information when you could be endlessly up-to-date? It's not like being slightly out of date occasionally is a manageable limitation in the grand scheme of things.
